title: OFL-SAM2: Prompt SAM2 with Online Few-shot Learner for Efficient Medical Image Segmentation
summary: The Segment Anything Model 2 (SAM2) has demonstrated remarkable promptable visual segmentation capabilities in video data, showing potential for extension to medical image segmentation (MIS) tasks involving 3D volumes and temporally correlated 2D image sequences.
